name: The 2nd International Conference on Education and Artificial Intelligence Technologies
content: Publication: Option I: Accepted papers can be included in the ACM proceedings, which can be indexed by EI Compendex and SCOPUS as a workshop of ICAAI 2021\. Option II: Accepted papers will be published to the special issue "International Journal of Information and Education Technology", with ISSN: 2010-3689, indexed by Scopus (Since 2019), EI(INSPEC, IET), Electronic Journals Library, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
